EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Summit at SpringOne Platform | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Partner Summit on September 24th in Washington D.C.
Date: Monday, September 24, 2018
Time:
11:30AM to 6:00PM
*Lunch will be provided.
Location: Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center 201 Waterfront St National Harbor, Maryland 20745 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Gaylord+National+Resort+%26+Convention+Center,+Oxon+Hill,+MD+20745/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x89b7b0734d793d5d:0x7fccb753cbe0c4f7?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwja-ufs_a3cAhURCTQIHQkzA9wQ8gEIRTAA]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at partners@pivotal.io <[[mailto:partners@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/S1P-Pivotal-Partner-Summit.html]]>
